input_args.passage: 'Wim Jonk - Wikipedia | Jonk and Jordi Cruyff co-manage and lead the Amsterdam-based international football institute Cruyff Football, based on the Plan Cruyff and the legacy of Johan Cruyff., Jordi Cruyff'
input_args.claim: 'By combining these two pieces of information, we can deduce that Wim Jonk co-manages Cruyff Football with the footballer who is also currently manager of Chongqing Dangdai Lifan.'
